resources.string: Triple Room have a minimum of 2 opening windows.with double bed and single bed facilities.and also this room have a small siting area
family Room offers space and comfort with thoughtful cotempory design and local srilankan touches

We have economy rooms available for solo travelers or those wishing to have their own privacy.These are comforatable with a large double bed have their own suits.All have plenty of light and windows are nicely finished.this is most comfortable for two persons
Standard Room have a minimum of 2 opening windows.with double bed facilities.and also this room have a small siting area
